channel.title: Comments on: Wizards of OS
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: Ethan
item.dc:creator: Ethan
item.description: I just got invited to the con as well, speaking on digital divide issues. Looks like we'll have the chance to engage in some mischief in Berlin - looking forward to it.
item.content:encoded: I just got invited to the con as well, speaking on digital divide issues. Looks like we’ll have the chance to engage in some mischief in Berlin – looking forward to it.

item.title: By: Tomas
item.dc:creator: Tomas
item.description:
Awesome,
Once again we will meet on the conference trail. Looking forward to meeting you there.
item.content:encoded:
Awesome,

Once again we will meet on the conference trail. Looking forward to meeting you there.

item.title: By: Tatejoris
item.dc:creator: Tatejoris
item.description: I think that the meeting has some major moments, but lots of senior moments Too
item.content:encoded: I think that the meeting has some major moments, but lots of senior moments Too
